title: Vista/Xp Shutdown Timer [Version 1.6.5]
description:
Vista/Xp Shutdown Timer [Version 1.6.5]

Vista-ShutdownTimer is a free and easy to use sleep-timer for windows.
You can use this Timer with a PC-IR Remote control. 
It has a OSD (On Screen Display), supports command line parameters,
supports manuel killing of hanging programs, classic modus,
Tray-Menu, Shortcut wizzard. 
All in a single EXE-File (<200 Kb) no Registry and no Ini Files-needed.
The program can be configured using command line parameters only..
But no worry: "Shortcut wizzard" does it all for you!

Vista/Xp Shutdown timer can:
-Can log off user.
-Can Hibernate pc.
-Can put pc in standby.
-Can restart pc.
-Can Shutdown pc.
Can do any of these at a set time.

Homepage: <a href="
http://www.vistashutdowntimer.toflo.de/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.vistashutdowntimer.toflo.de/</a>

Requirements:
*Windows Vista,Xp,2000
*Visual Basic 6 Runtime

Note: When the program is running, and its window is open on your desktop
to minimize it to the tray, simply right click on it.

This app is very useful.

PLEASE SEED WHEN YOU FINISH THE DOWNLOAD.

Enjoy!!
